description:
I would like to add the ability for NFS and GlusterFS to use mount options on the compute node that are specified by the Cinder node.

The Cinder side of this change has already been implemented for Havana in https://review.openstack.org/#/c/29323/ .

This bug is to track the Nova side of this enhancement.
title: Support Cinder mount options for NFS and GlusterFS

commit a6306bd05ca523e98cb7a834c2e312e602452763
Author: Eric Harney <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri May 10 13:43:23 2013 -0400

    Support Cinder mount options for NFS/GlusterFS
    
    When connecting to an NFS or GlusterFS volume, use
    mount options specified in the "options" field of
    the connection_info structure to perform the mount.
    
    This allows the Cinder volume service to specify mount
    options rather than only being able to configure them
    on the Nova compute node.
    
    Fixes: bug 1185180
    blueprint cinder-volume-options
